issue.title: [CF 477] 2x Landslide Proc
issue.body:
Hey guys ty for this amassing add-on.
I have a bit of problem with 2 procs at the same time of Landslide. I am a rogue with landslide on both weapons...
Yes i can easily track one proc of Landslide, but i don't know how to make it show that there are 2 procs(buffs) at the same time (they may even have the same ID, can we check whats the source of a certin buf? like MH/OH?). Can it show a stack number? (there are separate procs)

Anyways I am very sorry if this can already be tracked with the addon and please give me an exemple.
THank you in advance!


> Posted by CurseForge user MareleADI | Imported from CurseForge issue #477 | Raw

comments.body:
I wrote up some instructions on how to do this a while back, but I forgot to post them in the forums. Here they are now:

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/general/34718-track-mainhand-offhand-enchant-procs-separately/#p1


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Marking as invalid because it wasn't actually a feature that needed implementing - just instruction on how to use it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
